name: Loop Wood Shire - Ludum Dare 47
description:
This game was developed during the "Ludum Dare 47" game jam.

Developer: C64Gamer

DevTime: Around 40 hours

Important: WebBuild is missing some lighting and bloom effects because of a bug in Unity 2020.1. Playing the Windows version is recommended.

If you don't have a tenkey-pad you are also able to use the normal number keys but don't get knots in you fingers :D

Happy Looping! :-)

- How to Play:

You have to press the magic number: 4 7 8 9 6 3 2 1 on your tenkey pad ;-)

Bonus flags are not mandetory but should be collected if you wanna have a bigger highscore. They are giving the normal score multiplied by 3.

Difficulty:

Level 1 -5 : Beginner

Level 5 - 7: Advanced

Level: 8-11: Harcdore
